title: The Road Back
goal: Kaelen, Lyra, and Seraphina race back to the Sanctum, facing heightened dangers and internal conflict.

beats.summary: The trio begins their desperate, urgent return journey to the Sanctum, the weight of the Heartstone's truth and Valerius's betrayal pressing upon them.
The world outside the Sanctum is now overtly hostile, the Shadow Blight having intensified its grip, making every step perilous.
They face increased encounters with more powerful, insidious corrupted creatures, signs of the Shadow Lord's growing command.
Kaelen grapples with the devastating implications of the Heartstone's revelation, the knowledge that the blight is a perversion of his own order's magic.
Seraphina, ever pragmatic, questions the Sages' true purpose and their past failures, forcing Kaelen and Lyra to confront uncomfortable truths.
